Posts.Content: Datsy was my imaginary friend when I was a little girl.
Posts.Title: screen names-curuious if what they mean to everyone

Posts.Content: Waiting on the pathology report can be scary.  I was scared to death waiting on mine after my mastectomy.  I am free to talk anytime.  Hang in there.
Posts.Title: Hello... Looking for someone to talk to

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed April 15, 2015 with breast cancer and had a double mastectomy May 5, 2015.  I am a total nervous wreck.  I would love to have someone to chat with.  I am so scared.
Posts.Title: Hello... Looking for someone to talk to

Posts.Content: My thoughts and prayers will be with you.
Posts.Title: Hello... Looking for someone to talk to
